snippet: The Better Business Bureau reports a number of complaint report messages going around that appear to be from the bureau, but are really phishing scams.
abstract: The Better Business Bureau reports a number of complaint report messages going around that appear to be from the bureau, but are really phishing scams.

headline.main: Q&A: Spotting a Better Business Scam
headline.print_headline: Q&A: Not the B.B.B., But Spam
